name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior/Staff Frontend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in creating responsive, user-friendly interfaces using **React**, **Next.js**, **JavaScript**, and **TypeScript**. I am well-versed in API development and integration, ensuring seamless communication between front-end and back-end systems. My work emphasizes accessibility and usability principles, supporting product thinking and attention to design details.
In addition to my frontend expertise, I possess a rich technical background with frameworks like **Vue**, and am experienced in full-stack development utilizing **Node.js** alongside cloud services such as **AWS** and **Azure**. My commitment to strong problem-solving skills, curiosity, and autonomy drives me to deliver high-performance solutions. I have also led initiatives that incorporate AI/ML for innovative analytics while ensuring compliance with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS.
